# MediaDeviceMenu variable

The MediaDeviceMenu prefab component is a button that opens a menu that lists all media devices and allows the user to select them.

**Signature:**

```typescript
MediaDeviceMenu: ({
  kind,
  initialSelection,
  onActiveDeviceChange,
  tracks,
  requestPermissions,
  ...props
}: MediaDeviceMenuProps) => React.JSX.Element;
```

## Remarks

This component is implemented with the `MediaDeviceSelect` LiveKit components.

## Usage

```tsx
<LiveKitRoom>
  <MediaDeviceMenu />
</LiveKitRoom>
```
